page.title: 09Farming.Hoo area.
page.content: The area is chiefly devoted to arable farming-cereals (wheat) being the main crop.A variety of "break" crops are grown,the main ones being oilseed rape and sugarbeet, with peas and beans for freezing and potatoes. There is more than average grassland acreage along the Upper Deben Valley & this supports 4 Dairy herds,averageing 150 cows each.Grass is grazed & cut for hay and some maize is grown for sileage. Farm buildings have generally been adapted to house implements or turned into grain stores.Pigs now are housed in specialist buildings as are poultry. There are two poultry enterprises and one pig unit in the area.
